title: 3,500 MT of Gas to reach SL on Monday (4)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro announced that a vessel carrying 3,500 MT of gas will arrive in the country on Monday (4).
The Chairman of Litro company, Theshara Jayasinghe said that the Police have been instructed to continue raids to locate places selling gas at higher prices.
The Chairman of Litro urged the general public to inform the Police in the relevant area or call 1311 to provide information on errant traders.
Imposing Social Media Ban a violation of Human Rights – SL Human Rights Chief
